itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

item.name: Rough Opal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Opals require a certain level of skill to collect.

item.name: Opal Jewelry Box
item.desc: Opals harvested from the Balenos Sea are said to have the best quality. One of Velia’s specialty products is a jewel box decorated with this opal.

item.name: Brilliant Opal
item.desc:
A processed natural resource. It is used in alchemy and processing. 

- Obtained by: Heating rough opal several times. You'll need the knowledge "Heating: Intermediate."

 ※ See Plabiano in Heidel to complete the quest "Pure Water for Experiment" to gain the knowledge.

※ In order to proceed with the quest, you have to reach Gathering Level Apprentice 4 and see Ficy in Heidel to complete the serial quest. Call Black Spirit (/ key) for details.

item.name: [Jukebox] Prayer of Time
item.desc: A juke box that plays the Prayer of Time theme song.
